scenes.action_text: A bunch of College Kids are washing cars. The OWNER, a very hefty, tall man, is talking to Moocher. OWNER You're a little late, but I guess you won't let it happen again. Here's your sponge and here's your rag and there's your place. Cont. 567 REVISED - "BAMBINO" - 6 16 78 27 39 Cont. Moocher takes the sponge and the rag and heads for the car wash. He goes past the punch clock. -
